yuri_remote.title: Yuri Galaxy (sample)
questions: Is the character still a student when their story begins?
Does the story lean into slice-of-life or school club vibes?
Does the series feature fantasy or supernatural elements?
Is combat or organized action a major part of the plot?
Is the setting futuristic or science-fiction focused?
Is the cast tied to idols or music performances?
Is the series targeted at mature audiences?
Is this character one of the main protagonists?
Did the story originate as a manga or light novel?
Is the story set in a contemporary, mostly real-world setting?
Did the series debut in the modern streaming era (2010+)?

characters.name: Yuu Koito
characters.blurb: Soft-spoken first-year who discovers her own way to love while working on the student council.

characters.name: Touko Nanami
characters.blurb: Poised student council president carrying the weight of her sister's legacy.

characters.name: Yuzu Aihara
characters.blurb: Fashion-conscious transfer student whose world is upended by her new family.

characters.name: Mei Aihara
characters.blurb: Disciplined student council president grappling with duty and desire.

characters.name: Shima Honnami
characters.blurb: Daydreaming athlete who slowly opens up through quiet afternoons at the gymnasium.

characters.name: Sakura Adachi
characters.blurb: Truant loner who falls headfirst into her first crush.

characters.name: Utena Tenjou
characters.blurb: Prince-like duelist determined to protect Anthy from Ohtori Academy's conspiracies.

characters.name: Anthy Himemiya
characters.blurb: Mysterious Rose Bride bound to the dueling system.

characters.name: Chikane Himemiya
characters.blurb: Elegant shrine maiden who pilots a giant mech to defend the world with Himeko.

characters.name: Amane Kanata
characters.blurb: Stoic Etoile candidate adored across the three academies.
